steps.title: Item search
steps.content: In the library you can search for all things you have available in your TDE world. (Default Hotkey L)

steps.title: Filter
steps.content: Das Suchergebnis lässt sich weiter durch das Einschränken der Kategorie verfeinern.

steps.title: Detail filter
steps.content: Additionally, you can activate the detail filter to search the respective category for specific attributes.

steps.title: Index World Items
steps.content: Here you can enable or disable browsing of world items. World items is everything that can't be found in compendiums. This increases the performance a bit.

steps.title: Full text search
steps.content: Here you can disable or enable the full text search.
